What's cTrader?

cTrader is a widely used trading platform that offers a robust trading environment for both beginners and experienced traders. It provides:

  • Advanced charting and analysis tools
  • Automated trading capabilities
  • Secure and reliable execution
  • Extensive broker support

cTrader credentials

Follow the steps below to get your cTrader credentials.

1 Choose a cTrader Broker

To get started with cTrader, choose one of the brokers that support it:

Here are some brokers that support cTrader:

  • ICMarkets
  • Pepperstone
  • FXPro

To see all brokers supporting cTrader, visit the cTrader Brokers List.

2 Create a cTrader Account

  1. If you donâ€™t already have a cTrader account, visit the website of your chosen broker from the list above.
  2. Create an account or log in if you already have one.
  3. Open a cTrader trading account (demo or live) from the broker's dashboard.

3 Get Your cTrader Authentication Code

  1. Get your cTrader authentication code or by clicking on Get code from our automate dashboard when you're adding a cTrader account.
  2. From your accounts list select only one account to generate the authentication code for it. If select multiple accounts, the code will be generated for the first one only.
  3. Click on "Allow access" to generate your authentication code.
  4. Copy the generated authentication code.

Complete Integration

Once you have your authentication code, return to our platform's Automate section to link your cTrader account. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
